resources.string: Please sign in to view achievements.
Please sign in to view leaderboards.
You\'re playing in easy mode, so you got the score you requested! Wasn\'t that easy?
You\'re playing in hard mode, so you only got half the score you requested! Isn\'t this game hard?
Your existing achievements and score will be uploaded shortly.
What score do you think you deserve?
Sign in with Google to share your scores and achievements with your friends.
You are signed in with Google.
Sign in now to upload this score, save your achievements and share your progress with friends.
There was an issue with sign in. Please try again later.
There was an issue with sign-in, please try again later.
Failed to sign in. Please check your network connection and try again.

The application is incorrectly configured. Check that the package name and signing certificate match the client ID created in Developer Console. Also, if the application is not yet published, check that the account you are trying to sign in with is listed as a tester account. See logs for more information.
Failed to sign in. Please check your network connection and try again.

The application is incorrectly configured. Check that the package name and signing certificate match the client ID created in Developer Console. Also, if the application is not yet published, check that the account you are trying to sign in with is listed as a tester account. See logs for more information.
